experiences.title: Tech Lead (Daboka Project)
experiences.subtitle: Tech Space
workDescription: Lead the development team for the Daboka project, overseeing the implementation of technical solutions and ensuring project milestones were met on time and within budget.
Collaborated closely with stakeholders to define project requirements, prioritize tasks, and address technical challenges.
Provided mentorship and guidance to team members, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.

experiences.title: Tech Lead
experiences.subtitle: Go Deliveries
workDescription: Assumed the role of Tech Lead for the Go Deliveries project, leading a team of developers in the design, development, and deployment of innovative solutions to enhance the delivery platform.
Implemented best practices in software development, including code reviews, unit testing, and continuous integration, to ensure the delivery of high-quality software products.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align technical strategies with business objectives and drive project success.

experiences.title: Freelance App Developer
experiences.subtitle: Self-Employed
workDescription: Developed official apps for startups, delivering robust solutions for both Android and iOS platforms using hybrid frameworks.
Provided tailored app development services, meeting client specifications and exceeding expectations.
Collaborated with clients to understand their vision and translate it into functional and user-friendly mobile applications.
